fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: Fusaka devnet-5 launched Wed 2025-09-10; 3 BPOs completed, next Tues 06:32 UTC
BPO progression: 9→12→15→13 max blobs; next targets 48, then 72

critical_infrastructure.highlight: Devnet-3 experiencing unplanned non-finality; dropped from 78% to 63% participation
Geth/Erigon/Reth enforce 16M gas limit on eth_call, breaking UI functionality

client_updates.highlight: Nimbus: verify_cells_proofs inconsistent across clients; related to ckzg library versions
Nethermind: reorg bug with incorrect parent selection from different forks; fix testing
Nimbus can't run alpha.6 tests without ckzg 2.1.2; Teku reverted and disabled tests
Justin Traglia: Point-at-infinity commitments not handled properly in latest ckzg release

testing_progress.highlight: Felix verified EL configs pre-launch using new eth_config command in execution-spec-tests
ConsumeSync simulator live on Hive; tests EL sync for EIP-7934 RLP limit
Fusaka dashboard: ~20K tests for PragueToOsaka/Osaka/BPO transitions; mainly non-critical fails
Ethereum general state tests migrated to execution-spec-tests framework and running in Hive

organizational.highlight: Watchtower not running for devnet-5; manual image updates required via ethpandaops
Block-level access lists: next breakout Wed; awaiting first CL implementation for testing

action_items.action: Fix point-at-infinity handling in ckzg and publish new release
Fix eth_call regression enforcing gas limits on read-only methods

decisions.decision: EIP-7825 transaction gas limit not applied to eth_call read-only operations

targets.target: September 16, 06:32 UTC - Next BPO on fusaka-devnet-5 (to 48 max blobs)
End of month - Block-level access lists devnet launch
